summary: Just an ESP for his armor mod, for anyone who prefers stand-alones over replacers.
descriptionHtml:
Just an ESP for his armor mod, for anyone who prefers stand-alones over replacers.
I also made this armor set to light (I mean just look at it) If you prefer a heavy version, just feel free to let me know. I will get right on it.
Go download his mod first. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26773][u]Here you go[/u][/url]
Also, you will need to change the mesh folders a bit. It should look like this when you click through them.
(Data/Meshes/Armor/Gamefever/DragonSlayer)
Then just take the esp and place it into his Data folder then move the data folder into your Skyrim folder. Don\'t forget to to tick it on with the Launcher.
author: Ryu Shinji
